patthana15.18:4.1: Hetu atīto dhammo nahetussa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.18:4.2: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava … pe … upanissaye nava … pe … vigate nava.
patthana15.18:5.1: Hetu anāgato dhammo nahetussa naanāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
